test_results.unit_of_measurement: Essential Thrombocythemia PDW Increased vs Reactive Thrombocytosis PDW Normal or Other Conditions PDW Low Range Interpretation (PDLLS) Loss of Platelets in Blood Higher than normal range indicates that there may be iron deficiency or bone marrow disorders. 9 - lower than normal range indicate immune thrombocytopenia, hepatic disease, bone marrow diseases, or other conditions.
